## Summary
- What does this change do and why?

## Type of Change
- [ ] feat: new feature
- [ ] fix: bug fix
- [ ] refactor: code change (no behavior change)
- [ ] chore/docs/test/build
- [ ] breaking change

## Linked Issues
Closes #

If UI changes, add before/after.

## How to Test
1. Run `npm install`
2. Start dev: `npm run dev`
3. Run tests: `npm test`
4. Steps to validate the change:

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests added/updated where relevant
- [ ] Lint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Docs updated (e.g., `README.md`, `AGENTS.md`, `messages/*`)
- [ ] Env/config updates documented (`.env.example`)

Anything reviewers should pay attention to.
